episodes.title: Locked up for 30 years by an abusive cult leader
episodes.description: In a seemingly ordinary neighborhood of London, a young Katy experienced a life that was anything but common. For three decades, she was conined, by her own father who was an abusive cult leader. He sought to control every aspect of her existence, as he did with all of the other women in the cult.   For 30 years her world was limited to this house were she experienced manipulation, fear, abuse and isolation.  Today, we journey into the heart of darkness that was her life until she eventually escaped.  When she was thrown into a world, she had to learn about everything for the first time.   Welcome to They Survived, a podcast series where we talk with people who have the most extraordinary stories of survival and never gave up.  If you're inspired by this unique and extraordinary survival story, please follow and subscribe to our podcast/channel and check our social media for more stories like these.   Instagram  Tiktok Instagram HIEV  Thank you for listening! If you’d like to share something or have a question, reach out to: podcast@irisenthoven.com  Credits:  Camera: ⁠⁠⁠https://nl.emglive.com⁠⁠⁠  Edit: Karlijn de Vries  Research & production: Floor Slooten
